IPAddress - class jpcap.IPAddress.
This class represents an IP address.

Either IPv4 and IPv6 addresses can be represented by this class.
IPAddress(byte[]) - Constructor for class jpcap.IPAddress
Creates IP address of the specified byte array.
This doesn't check if the address is valid.
IPAddress(int, byte[]) - Constructor for class jpcap.IPAddress
Creates IP address of the specified version and byte array.
This doesn't check if the address is valid.
IPAddress(int, String) - Constructor for class jpcap.IPAddress
Creates an IP address of the specified version and IP address or domain name.
IPAddress(String) - Constructor for class jpcap.IPAddress
Creates IPv4 address of the specified address or domain name.
ippacket - Variable in class jpcap.ICMPPacket
IP header which was sent back
IPPacket - class jpcap.IPPacket.
This class represents an IP packet.

Both IPv4 or v6 packet can be handled by this class.
IPPacket() - Constructor for class jpcap.IPPacket
 
IPv6Option - class jpcap.IPv6Option.
This class represents an IPv6 option header.
IPv6Option() - Constructor for class jpcap.IPv6Option
 

J

jpcap - package jpcap
 
Jpcap - class jpcap.Jpcap.
Main class of package jpcap.
Capturing and Sending packets are done through the instance of this class.
Jpcap.JpcapInfo - class jpcap.Jpcap.JpcapInfo.
Class for keeping capture info.
Jpcap(String) - Constructor for class jpcap.Jpcap
Opens the dump file created by tcpdump and creates the instance of this class.
Jpcap(String, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class jpcap.Jpcap
Initializes the specified network interface and creates the instance of this class.
JpcapHandler - interface jpcap.JpcapHandler.
Interface to define the packet analyzing method for Jpcap.handlePacket()
JpcapWriter - class jpcap.JpcapWriter.
This class is to write packets to dump file
JpcapWriter(Jpcap.JpcapInfo, String) - Constructor for class jpcap.JpcapWriter
Create JpcapWriter instance for saving packets to dump file.

Currently only TCP/UDP/ICMP over IPv4 are supported.
For ICMP, only echo packets can be sent.
